request.description: Requests a new JWT access token.

item.name: Check if an Organization Account is available

request.description: Checks, if an organization account (tenant) with a given name is available.

header.description: Used in Kubernetes to protect the endpoint. See `cluedin-new-organization-access-key` secret.

request.description: Requests an invite code for a given email.

query.description: Uppercased MD5 of the user's email.

graphql.query:
query getEdgeSummary($id: ID!) {
  virtualization {
    entityEdgeSummary(id: $id) {
      id
      type
      name
      icon
      route
      displayName
      attributeOrigin
      codes
      edges {
        edgeType
        direction
        entityType
        entityId
        icon
        route
        name
        attributeOrigin
        codes
        createdDate
        isGrouped
        entityCount
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

query metricsByNameQuery($names: [String]) {
  metrics: metrics(names: $names) {
    name
    id
    dataType
    categories
    globalDimensions {
      id
      type
      detailType
      detail
      providerDefinitionId
      providerId
      providerName
      latestValue
      values
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

query metricsByNameQuery($names: [String]) {
  metrics: metrics(names: $names) {
    name
    id
    dataType
    categories
    globalDimensions {
      id
      type
      detailType
      detail
      providerDefinitionId
      providerId
      providerName
      latestValue
      values
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

graphql.query:
mutation createStream($stream: InputCreateStream!) {
  consume {
    id
    createStream(stream: $stream) {
      ...Stream
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment Stream on Stream {
  id
  name
  isActive
  createdBy
  modifiedBy
  type
  modifiedAt
  createdAt
  ownedBy
  condition
  rules
  numberOfRecords
  rulesApplied
  containerName
  mode
  exportOutgoingEdges
  exportIncomingEdges
  author {
    id
    username
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

mutation saveStream($stream: InputStream!) {
  consume {
    id
    saveStream(stream: $stream) {
      ...Stream
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment Stream on Stream {
  id
  name
  isActive
  createdBy
  modifiedBy
  type
  modifiedAt
  createdAt
  ownedBy
  condition
  rules
  numberOfRecords
  rulesApplied
  containerName
  mode
  exportOutgoingEdges
  exportIncomingEdges
  author {
    id
    username
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

query getStream($id: ID!) {
  consume {
    id
    stream(id: $id) {
      ...Stream
      description
      connector {
        id
        name
        accountDisplay
        streamModes
        connector {
          id
          name
          icon
          streamModes
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      mappingConfiguration
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment Stream on Stream {
  id
  name
  isActive
  createdBy
  modifiedBy
  type
  modifiedAt
  createdAt
  ownedBy
  condition
  rules
  numberOfRecords
  rulesApplied
  containerName
  mode
  exportOutgoingEdges
  exportIncomingEdges
  author {
    id
    username
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

query connectorConfigurationById($id: ID) {
  inbound {
    id
    connectorConfiguration(id: $id) {
      id
      name
      accountDisplay
      accountId
      active
      autoSync
      codeName
      configuration
      connector {
        id
        icon
        name
        authMethods
        properties
        streamModes
        __typename
      }
      createdDate
      entityId
      failingAuthentication
      guide
      helperConfiguration
      providerId
      reAuthEndpoint
      source
      sourceQuality
      stats
      status
      supportsAutomaticWebhookCreation
      supportsConfiguration
      supportsWebhooks
      userId
      userName
      users {
        id
        username
        roles
        __typename
      }
      webhookManagementEndpoints
      webhooks
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

mutation activateStream($streamId: ID!) {
  consume {
    id
    activateStream(streamId: $streamId) {
      ...Stream
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment Stream on Stream {
  id
  name
  isActive
  createdBy
  modifiedBy
  type
  modifiedAt
  createdAt
  ownedBy
  condition
  rules

  rulesApplied
  containerName
  mode
  exportOutgoingEdges
  exportIncomingEdges
  author {
    id
    username
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

mutation deactivateStream($streamId: ID!) {
  consume {
    id
    deActivateStream(streamId: $streamId) {
      ...Stream
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment Stream on Stream {
  id
  name
  isActive
  createdBy

  type

  exportIncomingEdges

    id
    username
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

The AccountId is visible in UI as the integration configuration's name.
